title: Neeye Neeye Song Lyrics M Kumaran
stanzas: <div>Neeye Neeye Song Lyrics M. Kumaran S/O Mahalakshmi

Neeye neeye naane neeye
en nenjil vazhum
uyir theeye neeye (2)

Thandhai neeye
thozhan neeye
thaalaatidum
en thozhi neeye

April May Veiyyilum neeye
June July Thendralum neeye
I Like You

September vaan mazhai neeye
Octopber Vaadaiyum neeye
I Thank You.

Unai pol oru
thaai thaan irukka
enna vendum vazhvil jayikka

Neeye neeye naane neeye
en nenjil vazhum
uyir theeye neeye

Thandhai neeye
thozhan neeye
thaalaatidum
en thozhi neeye

you are the love
of my life and my
dreams forever.

you are the love
of my heart and
my life forever.

en kannil neerum vanthaal
enn nenjil baaram vanthaal
saaivene un tholile

kanneerey koodaathendrum
en pillai vaadaathendrum
solvaaye annaalile

ini oru jenmam eduthu
vanthaalum un maganaagum
varam tharuvaai

un veettu chinna kuyil
nee konjum vanna kuyil
naan thaane.

naan vayathil valarnthaal
kooda madi oonjal
vendum aada.

Vaerukku neerai vittai
neeraai kanneerai vittaai
poovaachu en thottamae

un peyarai sollum pillai
poraadi vellum pillai
poo maalai en tholile

ilam pirai endru
irundhavan ennai
mulu nilavaai nee
vadivamaithaai

vattraadha gangai nadhiyaa
theiyaatha mangai madhiyaai
nee vazhga

pudhu vidiyal vendum
enakku entha naalum
neethaan kizhakku

Neeye neeye naane neeye
en nenjil vazhum
uyir theeye neeye

Thandhai neeye
thozhan neeye
thaalaatidum
en thozhi neeye

April May Veiyyilum neeye
June July Thendralum neeye
I Like You

September vaan mazhai neeye
Octopber Vaadaiyum neeye
I Thank You.

Unai pol oru
thaai thaan irukka
enna vendum vazhvil jayikka

I love you
my dear mom
you are my only friend

hats off to you mom
I love you forever

seo.title: Neeye Neeye Song Lyrics M Kumaran
seo.description: Get the complete Neeye Neeye Song Lyrics M Kumaran from M Kumaran S/O Mahalakshmi. composed by Srikanth Deva and sung by KK. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
